incidents.name: [RBX8][Dedicated Servers] - Rack R807R02 incident notification
incidents.message: We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Dedicated Servers offer on rack R807R02 in RBX8. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 05/08/2025 23:18 UTC Impacted Service(s) : vRack private network on the servers in the specified rack is unavailable. Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access and use their servers through vRack private network. Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.name: [GRA][Virtual Private Servers] - VPS instances incident notification
incidents.message: We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting your service(s) has now been resolved. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 05/08/2025 22:15 UTC End time : 05/08/2025 22:46 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Some actions relating to instances located in the GRA4 regions were unable to be performed. Customers Impact : Some customers were unable to perform actions on their instances in the specified region. Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.
